text: Hagi Ra Anumzamo'a amanage hu'ne. Nagrama mevava fenozane hu'na Nagri vahe Israeli naga'ma zamuge'za nemaniza mopamofo tavaonte'ma nemani'za havi avu'ava'ma nehaza vahe'mo'zama, ana mopama eri havizama hu'naza vahera mopa zamifintira zamahenati atregahue. Ana nehu'na Juda vahe'enena ana vahe amu'nompintira zamahenati atregahue.
